title: "Remarkable...": UN Hails India Life Expectancy, Per Capita Income Rise
selftext:
"Remarkable...": UN Hails India Life Expectancy, Per Capita Income Rise

https://www.ndtv.com/india-news/united-nations-human-development-index-report-india-remarkable-un-hails-india-life-expectancy-per-capita-income-increase-5237266
comments:
Completely unbiased reporting by Adani owned news agency.Â 


Life expectancy has improved to 67 in 2022 from 62 in 2021.
It's simply an impact of Covid easing in 2022 especially given the fact that it was 70 in 2019.


Also BJP has been ruling the country for almost 10 years but India's HDI rank has been more or less the same.Â
